description:
AJCD-06 EMBROIDERED CHIFFON 3 PCS

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Chiffon Trouser: Twisted silk Dupatta: Chiffon Color: Green

Dive into a world of enchantment and splendor with this ethereal ensemble. Like the lush green forests kissed by sunlight, this bottle green masterpiece is adorned with silver lorex and gold zariwork reminiscent of glistening dewdrops on leaves. The embroidered sleeves, hem and chaak detailing on both front and back weave a tale of timeless elegance and grace. Embellished with 5mm gold sequins, this ensemble sparkles casting a spell of enchantment wherever you go. The luminous neckline and borders add a touch of celestial radiance to this majestic creation inviting you to embrace your inner goddess and shine bright in every moment.    
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered front center panel on chiffon
Embroidered front side panel left & right on chiffon
30'' embroidered back with border on chiffon
Embroidered sleeve with border on chiffon
30'' embroidered border for front hemline on chiffon
2.5 meter embroidered chaak for front & back on chiffon
2.5 meter embroidered dupatta with side border on chiffon
1.5 meter trouser on twisted silk
